posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked: Hello, my team is currently running falcon motors on our mk4 SDS swerve modules. are the kraken motors are a drop in replacements for the propulsion motors?

posts.name: Alex
posts.cooked:
Yes, but you’ll need the additional pinion kit for the motors to be used.

Check this spreadsheet for current lead times. This kit contains the components specific to the type of motor used with the MK4i Swerve Module. Example: Selecting the NEO option will enable you to convert a MK4i swerve module originally...

Price: USD 22.00

which don’t seem to be in stock…

link_counts.title: Kit, Pinion Gear (MK4i) – Swerve Drive Specialties

posts.cooked: they’re using Mk4, not Mk4i; the correct product is Kit, Pinion Gear (MK3/4) – Swerve Drive Specialties which is currently in stock.

link_counts.title: Kit, Pinion Gear (MK3/4) – Swerve Drive Specialties

posts.name: Alex
posts.cooked:
I totally misread that. You’d need the same ones we got ! You will need the plates for them as well…

This item includes 2 motor risers and associated hardware. Typically, 2 motor risers are used per swerve module.These motor risers are designed to eliminate the need for teams to cut their motor shafts with MK2, MK3, and MK4 Swerve Modules....

Price: USD 25.00

link_counts.title: Kit, Riser, Motor (MK2/3/4) – Swerve Drive Specialties

posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked: is it possible to have a module with kraken and falcon?

posts.name: Domtech
posts.cooked: Yes. We are doing that with modified MK4is

posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked:
this kit is not available for out L2 swerve, but is the only part that is different is the Drive Pinion Gear between the L2 kit and the L4 kit, if we buy this gear from WCP , will it work?

This Page is for Reference Only

Price: USD 8.99

link_counts.title: 14t Steel Spur Gear (20 DP, 8mm SplineXS Bore) – WestCoast Products

posts.name: Tom
posts.cooked:
UPDATE: we got the riser:

This item includes 2 motor risers and associated hardware. Typically, 2 motor risers are used per swerve module.These motor risers are designed to eliminate the need for teams to cut their motor shafts with MK2, MK3, and MK4 Swerve Modules....

Price: USD 25.00

with the pinion gears from here:

Check this spreadsheet for current lead times. This kit contains the components specific to the type of motor used with the MK4 Swerve Module. Example: Selecting the NEO option will enable you to convert a MK4 swerve module originally...

Price: USD 6.00

for L4 gear ratio, and got the only gear than is diffrent from WCP

This Page is for Reference Only

Price: USD 8.99

installation was very easy, and it works very well. used them during ISR #4 and ISR DCMP and had no problems.
